directions: Cream sugar and butter or margarine together.  Add flour and nutmeg; mix until mealy.  Spread 1/2 of mixture in pie crust.  Arrange peaches on top of crumb mixture.  Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture on top of peaches.
Bake at 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) for ten minutes.  Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Continue baking for 40 minutes, or until brown.
ingredients: 6 fresh peaches - pitted, skinned, and sliced
1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Single Crust Peach Pie
